ryanatl wrote:

> Does Heritrix recognize/support the rel=nofollow attribute?
>
> Seems to be a good defense against endlessly crawling blogs.
>
> A bit more information:
> #14 @ http://www.google.com/webmasters/bot.html#www

Thanks for the pointer. We already have an RFE to do this: 
http://sourceforge.net/tracker/index.php?func=detail&aid=1106992&group_id=73833&atid=5391020.  
We need to get on it.

St.Ack
